name: ALJUHARAH ALMOUSA
summary: I am a recent Data Science graduate seeking a training opportunity to develop my skills in data analysis, programming, and database management. Motivated to contribute to solving real-world problems in a supportive work environment

projects.name: BASEERA PLATFORM FOR ACADEMIC ADVISING
projects.description: Built an AI-based platform for academic advising by designing the interface and managing the database to personalize student support.

projects.name: AI IMPACT ON FINANCE SECTOR — DATA VISUALIZATION DASHBOARD
projects.description: Created a Power BI dashboard to analyze AI’s influence on finance sector roles, skills, and automation trends.

projects.name: ANALYZING HEART HEALTH FACTORS AND PREDICTING DISEASE RISK
projects.description: Led a data analysis project using health and demographic data to identify risk factors and build predictive models.

projects.name: PERSONAL FINANCE MANAGER (PFM) PROJECT
projects.description: Developed a personal budgeting tool to track income, expenses, and categorize transactions.

projects.name: CUSTOMER BEHAVIOR ANALYSIS FOR IMPROVING BANKING MARKETING CAMPAIGNS
projects.description: Conducted customer behavior analysis and evaluated marketing campaigns to provide improvement recommendations.
